page.title: 09Carnival in N.W.Edinburgh
page.content: Craigroyston{Carnival}is a week-long annual{festival.}Pupils from our school took part in a 7-mile marathon on the Sunday, and in competitions during the week, including Disco Dancing, Pool, Table Tennis and Its a Knockout. There was a concert with international items, as this is {International Youth Year.}On the Saturday, a gala is held, mainly at Craigroyston School. A{Gala Queen}is chosen to be crowned. This year's queen was a pupil from Ferryhill School. Her name is Karen Agnello and she wore a flowing white dress with a red velvet robe. Her eight attendants were dressed in orange and green. They arrived in a float which was decorated with flags. There were speeches, and music was played for a majorette display. Later people could spend their money at the side shows.
